name: Heurodis Ephemera
description: Carry the spirits of the Otherworld with you.

languages.description: Trage die Geister der Anderswelt bei dir.
languages.name: Ephemera: Heurodis

languages.description: Emportez avec vous les esprits de l'au-delà.
languages.name: Ephemera Heurodis

languages.description: Porta con te gli spiriti dell'Altromondo.
languages.name: Ephemera Heurodis

languages.description: Lleva contigo los espíritus del Otro Mundo.
languages.name: Efímero Heurídice

languages.description: 与黄泉归来的灵魂作伴。
languages.name: 尤丽迪茜幻纹

languages.description: Пусть духи потустороннего мира сопровождают вас.
languages.name: Эфемера: Гевродис

languages.description: 異世界の精神を肌身離さず。
languages.name: Heurodis エフェメラ

languages.description: Noś w sobie duchy z Innego Świata.
languages.name: Efemera Heurodis

languages.description: Carregue os espíritos do Outro Mundo com você.
languages.name: Efêmera: Eurídice

languages.description: 與異世界的靈魂一同前行。
languages.name: 尤洛狄絲幻紋

languages.description: พาจิตวิญญาณจากโลกอื่นติดตามคุณไปด้วย
languages.name: อิเฟมเมอรา Heurodis
